channel.title: ::hail command?
channel.description:
Hi, i would like to add a hail command so that everyone in the server says for ie. "owner rules!" Does anyone know the command? and where i would add it? I just started my server. Help is appreciated.
[b]*if in wrong section, please move thread to appropriate section*[/b]

item.title: ::hail command?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Motokid126:

Ooo nice this helped me, where should it be posted? This will help me and him =p

The void can go just about anywhere as long as its under the public class and not inside an existing Void or Boolean, place it under public class Client extends Player implements runnable { If your unsure

The command goes under customCommands

Read full topic

item.title: ::hail command?
item.dc:creator: @Legendary_K0 Legendary_K0
item.description:
@Legendary_K0 wrote:

I got 9 errors. This is what i placed in client.java at very bottom. (ill attach a picture of errors when i find out how :P) Anyone know whats wrong?

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null) { client castOn = (client)p; castOn.plrText = "I'm BarragedX's bitch!!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("hail") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner"))) { hail();

item.title: ::hail command?
item.dc:creator: @Frozen_Lulz Frozen Lulz
item.description:
@Frozen_Lulz wrote:

If you have DeltaScape, just look for the void “public void hail”, copy it, paste it, change it to “public void hail2”, then change “ALL HAIL “+playerName+”” to “owner rules!”, then look for hail(), under that;

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“hail2”) && playerRights > 2)) {
hail2();
}

Read full topic

item.title: ::hail command?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null) { client castOn = (client)p; castOn.plrText = "Owner Rules!!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("hail") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner"))) { hail(); }

Read full topic
